Class Physics

java.lang.Object
us.stomberg.solarsystemsim.physics.Physics
public class Physics extends Object
Static class to handle all body interactions.

  • Constructor Details

    • Physics

      public Physics()

  • Method Details

    • createBodies

      public static void createBodies()
      Populates the array of bodies based on the generation data. After generating the bodies, gets the max initial distance of any one body from the origin.

    • updateBodies

      public static void updateBodies(double fps)
      Updates every body in the body array. Runs the update function for each body to update the motion, then updates the gravitational forces between each body and every other body. Finally, it checks for collisions between every body. If two bodies have collided it runs the collision function on the larger one and removes the smaller one.

      The code to update the physics for every body is run once for every millisecond in the simulation that has passed since the previous frame. That is the real time milliseconds passed times the time scale.

      Parameters:
      fps - current average fps

    • modifyTimeScale

      public static void modifyTimeScale(boolean increase)
      Increases or decreases the time scale based on the input. Is bound to a keymap in the Keymaps class.
      Parameters:
      increase - whether to increase or decrease the time scale

    • getTimeScale

      public static int getTimeScale()
      Getter method for the current time scale in milliseconds.
      Returns:
      Returns the time scale.

    • getBodyArray

      public static ArrayList<Body> getBodyArray()
      Getter method for the ArrayList of bodies.
      Returns:
      Returns the ArrayList of bodies.

    • getInitBounds

      public static double getInitBounds()
      Gets the initial boundaries for the simulation view. Equal th=o the furthest distance from the origin any one body starts at.
      Returns:
      Returns the initial boundaries for the view.

    • getDuration

      public static long getDuration()
      Gets the duration of the simulation. This variable is increased each time the physics are updated.
      Returns:
      Returns the simulation duration.
